attributes.action: Use Technology for truer and real democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Has it occurred to anyone that if we can vote for trivia like celebrity come dancing, that we can also vote potentially on social and polical issues, that are really important to we the people.
We now have the technology in its various forms to re engage the voting population, perhaps deferring to them instead of The House of Lords.
Let the issues decide, not the party politics, and stop this nonsence.
Then we can have a fully engaged savi political population, instead of the apathy and disenfranchisement that we have now.
Remember where theres a will, and to ignore is at your long term peril.
Politics is not just for the party political few, but for us all, we now have the technolgy to engage all the voting public, take the opportunity, put it to the vote, if you dare.
Yours, Joe Roberts, swing voter, ie the ones that make a difference, never to be institutionalised.
